==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 4 | location 78-80 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 17:25:04

leveling the playing field for anyone who’d been held back from achieving greatness due to an inability to effectively communicate their thoughts and ideas in a way that connected with other people and moved them to take action.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 5 | location 95-96 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 17:27:10

questionable language patterns, or even the slightest reference to closing a sale at all costs to simply earn a commission; all of these were purged from the system in favor of more elegant strategies.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 5 | location 105-108 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 17:30:27

You see, one of the costliest mistakes that “civilians” make is that they tend to think of sales and persuasion in traditional terms only, where there’s a salesperson closing a deal. So, they ask themselves, “Since I’m not in sales, what’s the point of learning how to sell?”
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 6 | location 115-117 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 17:43:56

After all, at some point in our lives, we’ll all have to sell ourselves to someone: a prospective partner, a future employer, a future employee, a future first date, and on and on.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 6 | location 121-122 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 17:44:47

We’re always trying to convey our thoughts and ideas and hopes and dreams in a way that not only moves people to take action but that also gets us what we want in life too.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 8 | location 122-122 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 17:45:01

ethical persuasion
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 8 | location 124-126 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 17:45:26

By providing you with a simple, proven way to master the art of communication, you’ll be able to move through life with far greater personal power and live a far more empowered life.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 10 | location 145-146 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 18:24:40

The rest of the world actively shies away from it—despite knowing how absolutely crucial it is to the achievement of wealth and success.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 13 | location 194-196 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 18:37:30

Looking back at that moment now, standing before the brokers and trying to explain how every sale is the same, I would have never guessed how close I was to inventing the world’s most powerful sales training system.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 14 | location 198-199 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 18:38:01

the same three key elements must still line up in any prospect’s mind before you have a shot at closing them.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 14 | location 199-200 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 18:38:13

Let me repeat that: the reason every sale is the same is because, despite all that individual stuff, the same three key elements still have to line up in any prospect’s mind before you have a shot at closing them. And it doesn’t
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 14 | location 200-201 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 18:38:25

matter what you’re selling or how you’re selling it; how much it costs or how much
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 14 | location 202-203 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 18:38:39

in a single moment in time, you can create these three crucial elements in a prospect’s mind, then you’ve got an excellent shot of closing. Conversely, if even one of them is missing, you have basically no shot at
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 14 | location 205-206 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 19:48:49

We call these three core elements the Three Tens—with the context being a prospect’s current state of certainty on a scale from one to ten.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 14 | location 210-212 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 20:27:15

absolutely certain that the product makes sense to them, insofar as it filling their needs, eliminating any pain they might have, being a good value for the money … and so forth.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 14 | location 208-212 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 20:36:17

Now, in sales, when we talk about certainty, the first thing that pops into people’s minds is certainty about the actual product being sold. In other words, before there’s any chance of a prospect buying a product, they first have to be absolutely certain that the product makes sense to them, insofar as it filling their needs, eliminating any pain they might have, being a good value for the money … and so forth.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 15 | location 215-216 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 20:37:25

System, your prospect must think it’s the best thing since sliced bread!
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 15 | location 216-218 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 20:37:49

tangible products like cars, boats, houses, food, clothing, consumer products, and all the various services people perform; and also intangible products, like ideas and concepts and values and beliefs, or any vision
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 15 | location 221-223 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 20:38:18

This represents your prospect being in a state of absolute certainty about the value and efficacy of your product, or put more simply, your prospect absolutely loves it!
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 16 | location 226-227 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 20:38:45

That’s a 10 on the certainty scale: your prospect absolutely loves your product, and they’re damn sure of it.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 16 | location 232-233 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 20:40:39

That’s a 1 on the certainty scale: your prospect absolutely despises your product, and it’s going to be difficult to change their mind.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 17 | location 239-240 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 20:41:34

The important thing to remember here is that, while being at a 5 does, indeed, mean that your prospect is fifty-fifty on your product, it does not mean that you only
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 17 | location 240-241 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 20:41:37

have a fifty-fifty chance of closing them.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 17 | location 244-244 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 20:42:07

In both of these cases, however, whether your prospect is at a 7 or a 3, there are two important things to remember.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 17 | location 246-248 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 20:42:31

In other words, their current state of certainty is just that—current. It is not permanent, and they are eagerly waiting to be influenced by you. Now, when it comes time to ask for the order, it
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 17 | location 248-249 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 20:42:42

doesn’t take a rocket scientist to figure out that the closer you’ve gotten your prospect to a 10,
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 17 | location 249-249 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 20:42:46

the better chance you have of closing them.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 17 | location 249-250 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 20:42:58

On the other hand, the farther away your prospect is from a 10, the worse chance you have of closing them. From a practical standpoint, if your prospect is anywhere below a 5, you have basically no chance of closing them.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 17 | location 250-252 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 20:43:10

The reason for this has to do with something called positive intent, which serves as the very foundation from which all human beings make their decisions.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 17 | location 253-254 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 20:44:38

You see, just because someone has positive intent doesn’t necessarily mean that the resulting decisions will end up having a positive impact on them.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 18 | location 255-256 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 20:44:57

However, even these “serial bad decision-makers” believe their decisions were good when they made them. That’s the definition of positive intent.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 19 | location 275-277 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 22:28:39

In fact, if they’re that intent on purchasing your product, then they simply find someone else who sells the same thing—a salesperson they trust—and they will buy it from that salesperson instead. It’s as simple as that.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 20 | location 288-290 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 22:30:01

Maybe you broke rapport with them as a result of something you said during your sales presentation—or perhaps it happened even earlier than that, at the moment the prospect first laid eyes on you. Maybe there was something about the way you
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 20 | location 291-292 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 22:30:22

Or maybe it was the way you asked questions when you were trying to gather intelligence, to identify their needs and values and to see if they were financially qualified.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 20 | location 294-296 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 22:30:49

Whatever the case, my point is that, in the same way that you have varying degrees of certainty for how the prospect feels about your product, there are also varying degrees of certainty for how the prospect feels about you.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 21 | location 304-307 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 22:32:13

They’re slim and nil; and slim, as they say, left town. It’s really quite simple: if your prospect doesn’t trust the company you work for, then there’s absolutely no way they are going to buy from you—so long as you continue to work there, or until you can convince them otherwise.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 21 | location 307-308 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 22:32:27

And, again, I don’t care how certain they are about the first two Tens. They will simply not buy from you if they think the company you work for will ultimately try to screw them.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 21 | location 312-313 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 22:32:51

In fact, this is why it’s so much easier to sell to existing customers than to new ones, even if you don’t have a personal relationship with them.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 23 | location 335-336 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 22:37:58

they will always enter the encounter with a preconceived notion about you, about
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 23 | location 335-336 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 22:38:02

they will always enter the encounter with a preconceived notion about you, about your product, and about the company you work for.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 24 | location 347-348 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 22:40:06

logical certainty, and you have emotional certainty, and they’re entirely different things.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 24 | location 349-350 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 22:40:25

For instance, does the case you’ve made to the prospect add up on an intellectual level?
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 24 | location 350-351 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 22:40:36

I’m talking about the actual facts and figures, the features and benefits, and the long-term value proposition, as it relates specifically to that prospect.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 24 | location 350-353 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 22:42:04

I’m talking about the actual facts and figures, the features and benefits, and the long-term value proposition, as it relates specifically to that prospect. In other words, from a sober, emotionless perspective, does the idea or thesis that you’ve presented to them make sense? Does your product or service truly fill their needs? Is it priced fairly when compared to the competition? Does the cost-benefit ratio make it an unequivocally great deal?
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 24 | location 355-357 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 22:42:31

As a result, they feel confident in their ability to tell the story to someone else and, if necessary, convince that person that they are 100 percent justified to feel the way they do—that, from a purely empirical perspective, the truth is on the their side.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 25 | location 357-357 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 22:42:39

That’s what logical certainty is all about.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 25 | location 358-360 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 22:42:52

On the flip side, emotional certainty is based on a gut feeling that something must be good. Once it hits us, we feel a craving inside that simply must be fulfilled, even if there’s a heavy price to pay for fulfilling it.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 25 | location 360-362 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 22:43:01

Unlike logical certainty, emotional certainty has to do with painting your prospect a picture of the future where they’ve bought your product and can see themselves using the product and feeling good as a result of it.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 25 | location 362-363 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 22:43:20

We call this technique future pacing, and it serves as the very backbone of how we move someone emotionally.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 25 | location 367-368 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 22:44:08

You see, people don’t buy on logic; they buy on emotion, and then justify their decision with logic.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 26 | location 369-370 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 22:44:27

“It sounds great, let me think about it …” or “Let me do a bit more research and I’ll call you back.”
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 26 | location 382-383 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 22:46:11

fact, it’s an important aspect of the Straight Line System, as one of its cornerstone philosophies is that we do not make a full-blown sales presentation to someone
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 27 | location 385-387 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 22:46:39

Remember, it’s not the job of salespeople to turn nos into yeses; it’s simply not what they do. Instead, we turn “Let me think about it” into a yes, and “Let me call you back” into a yes, and “I need to speak to my wife” into a yes, and “It’s a bad time of year” into a yes.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 27 | location 390-391 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 22:47:00

You see, at the end of the day, objections are merely smoke screens for uncertainty for one or all of the Three Tens.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 27 | location 396-398 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 22:48:06

For example, it’s far less confrontational to say, “Let me think about it” or “It’s a bad time of year,” to someone who’s just spent the last ten minutes telling you how wonderful a product is than to say, “I don’t trust you” or “I think
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 27 | location 396-400 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 22:48:14

For example, it’s far less confrontational to say, “Let me think about it” or “It’s a bad time of year,” to someone who’s just spent the last ten minutes telling you how wonderful a product is than to say, “I don’t trust you” or “I think your product stinks” or “I don’t like your company” or “I can’t afford it right now” or “Your product seems kind of great, but I’m not 1000 percent sure of that, and I simply can’t afford to risk being wrong and have my spouse chasing me around the house screaming: ‘I told you so! I told you so!’”
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 27 | location 396-402 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 22:48:38

For example, it’s far less confrontational to say, “Let me think about it” or “It’s a bad time of year,” to someone who’s just spent the last ten minutes telling you how wonderful a product is than to say, “I don’t trust you” or “I think your product stinks” or “I don’t like your company” or “I can’t afford it right now” or “Your product seems kind of great, but I’m not 1000 percent sure of that, and I simply can’t afford to risk being wrong and have my spouse chasing me around the house screaming: ‘I told you so! I told you so!’” So, to avoid the possibility of a head-on confrontation, the prospect conjures up a little white lie, a special lie, a lie that gives the salesperson just enough false hope to make them think that there is a shot of getting a callback by ending the encounter
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 27 | location 396-402 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 22:48:42

For example, it’s far less confrontational to say, “Let me think about it” or “It’s a bad time of year,” to someone who’s just spent the last ten minutes telling you how wonderful a product is than to say, “I don’t trust you” or “I think your product stinks” or “I don’t like your company” or “I can’t afford it right now” or “Your product seems kind of great, but I’m not 1000 percent sure of that, and I simply can’t afford to risk being wrong and have my spouse chasing me around the house screaming: ‘I told you so! I told you so!’” So, to avoid the possibility of a head-on confrontation, the prospect conjures up a little white lie, a special lie, a lie that gives the salesperson just enough false hope to make them think that there is a shot of getting a callback by ending the encounter now, without pressing the prospect any further.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 28 | location 408-410 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 22:49:57

Before we move on, I just want to dispel any notion you might have that Straight Line’s strategy for handling objections is going to promote, support, or even remotely recommend the use of high-pressure sales tactics in any way whatsoever.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 30 | location 413-415 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 22:52:11

With the Straight Line System, we don’t leave a crucial outcome like honest communication up to chance. We ensure it by making it the sole responsibility of the salesperson, and then providing him or her with a bulletproof formula to achieve that outcome every time.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 30 | location 416-417 | Added on Monday, 25 October 2021 22:52:40

Coincidentally, it was the subject of handling objections that first got me thinking about a better way to train salespeople, and that led me to that groundbreaking statement that every sale is the same.

Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 34 | location 475-475 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 11:02:17

First, that it was a bad time
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 34 | location 476-477 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 11:02:26

And second, that they needed to speak to someone else,
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 35 | location 485-487 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 11:03:15

that the common objections were nothing more than smoke screens for what was really holding a prospect back, which was a lack of certainty.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 35 | location 490-493 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 11:04:47

In consequence, after I answered an objection, I would then loop back to the beginning of the sale and make a follow-up presentation that picked up where my initial presentation had left off—with a goal of increasing the prospect’s state of certainty for all three Tens. And, once again, as with the rest of my strategies, I would execute each one of my loops in precisely the same exact way, every single time.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 36 | location 494-495 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 11:05:16

The image, as it turned out, was a perfectly straight line.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 36 | location 498-499 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 11:05:51

my mind’s eye, I could see my own sales strategy being pulled apart, into its elemental pieces, and then put back together, in exactly the right order, along a perfectly straight line.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 36 | location 500-502 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 11:06:23

Until that very moment, I simply hadn’t known why I had been able to far outsell every other salesperson, at every single company I had ever worked for. But now I knew.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 36 | location 502-504 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 11:06:37

My own sales strategy, which had been mostly unconscious until then, had suddenly become conscious. I could see each distinct chunk of my strategy, as if it had the defined edges of a jigsaw piece, and each individual piece seemed to be screaming out its purpose at me. But there was more—much, much more.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 37 | location 509-511 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 11:07:51

to scenes going back all the way to my childhood, of random sales situations I had been in on either side, as salesperson or prospect, and a vivid memory of why I had said no or yes to the salespeople, or the prospects had said no or yes to me.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 37 | location 515-516 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 11:08:17

In short, I would teach them to sell exactly the way I did—by taking immediate control of the sale, and then moving the prospect from the open to the close along the shortest distance between any two points: a straight line.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 38 | location 523-525 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 11:35:49

“The key here is that, from literally the first word out of your mouth, everything you say and everything you do is designed to keep your prospect on the straight line, and slowly nudge him forward, from the open to the close. You guys follow me so far?” The Strattonites
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 38 | location 525-526 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 11:35:56

nodded in unison. The room was so quiet you could have heard a pin drop. The air felt electric.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 38 | location 529-532 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 11:36:39

“It’s one of those sales where everything you say, and everything you do, and every case you make about why the prospect should buy from you, he keeps on saying, yes, yes, yes, without giving you even a single objection, right up to the moment where you ask him for the order, and he agrees to close. That’s what I mean by a perfect straight-line sale.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 39 | location 542-544 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 11:38:03

“So what we have are these healthy boundaries, above and below the line—one here and one here,” I continued, drawing two dotted lines that were parallel to the straight line, one of them six inches above it, and the other six inches below it.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 39 | location 544-547 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 11:38:22

“When you’re inside the boundaries, you’re in control of the sale, and moving forward towards the close. When you’re outside the boundaries, the client is in control and you’re spiraling off to Pluto, or down here, to Your-anus, where you’re talking about the price of tea in China or politics in America or some other irrelevant topic that’s not germane to the sale.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 40 | location 553-555 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 11:39:35

To them, it’s actually repulsive, not attractive, which is the opposite of what building rapport is all about.” I shrugged. “Anyway, it doesn’t really matter, because you guys are done with that shit, now. It’s over.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 40 | location 557-558 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 11:40:07

This is where you’re in control. Boom, boom!” I banged my right knuckle on two spots inside the boundaries, one above the line and one below, and I marked each spot with the initials IC.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 40 | location 558-561 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 11:40:15

“And here and here: this is where you’re out of control.” And I banged my right knuckle on two spots outside of the boundaries, one above the top dotted line and one below the bottom dotted line, and then I marked each space with the initials OC. “In control, out of control,” I repeated, tapping the respective initials.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 41 | location 562-564 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 11:40:35

“Now, when you’re on the straight line—meaning, directly on it—that’s where you’re doing all the talking. And all these little arrows here: the reason they’re all pointing down the line, to the close”—
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 41 | location 565-566 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 11:40:57

“is because with every single word you say there’s one specific goal in mind, and that’s to move the prospect down the straight line towards the close; that’s it.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 41 | location 568-572 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 11:42:07

“When you’re speaking, it’s directed. It’s powerful. Your words have meaning behind them; and the meaning is to create massive certainty in the mind of your prospect as you move him down the straight line, from the open to the close.” I pointed to the arrows again. “That’s why every one of these arrows is compact, and tight, and right on the line—and they’re all pointed straight towards the close.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 41 | location 577-578 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 11:43:12

massive intelligence, which up until tonight, I used to refer to as qualifying.
==========

“When you gather intelligence from a prospect, you’re doing all of the following things: “First, you’re identifying their needs—and not just their core need but also any secondary needs or ‘problems’ they might have. “Second, you’re identifying any core beliefs they might have that could impact the sale, such as not feeling comfortable working over the phone or with making quick decisions, and also not trusting salespeople in general. “Third, you want to find out about any past experiences they’ve had with similar products, both good and bad, and how they feel about the salespeople they bought them from. “Fourth, you want to identify their values—meaning, what things are most important to them? “In fact, think of this as goal-oriented communication,” I continued, spitting out the phrase at literally the same instant it popped into my mind. “Every word that comes out of your mouth is feeding into one single goal, which is to increase your prospect’s level of certainty to the highest possible level, as you’re moving him down the straight line towards the close. Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 46 | location 640-644 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 11:53:28

By midnight, I had laid out the framework for the entire system, and had created the first Straight Line Syntax. Consisting of eight distinct steps, the syntax served as a simple road map for taking a prospect down the straight line. It showed the Strattonites what to do first, what to do second, what to do third … all the way down to the eighth and final step, where the prospect either said yes, and opened an account with you, or he stuck to whatever objection he’d been using as his smoke screen, and you ended the call, respectfully, and moved on to the next prospect.

==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 50 | location 702-705 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 19:05:02

The prospect must love your product. The prospect must trust and connect with you. The prospect must trust and connect with your company.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 51 | location 708-710 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 19:05:58

However, that being said, what you need to remember here is that this is not the type of process that happens all at once. In fact, in the vast majority of cases, you’re going to have to ask for the order at least two or three times before you have any chance of your prospect saying yes.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 51 | location 712-714 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 19:06:29

Alternatively, this is the point in the sale where you’ll find out if you have a lay-down on your hands, in which case the prospect will simply say yes, and you can close the deal without having to address any objections.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 51 | location 714-716 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 19:06:44

But, as I said before, these lay-down sales are few and far between. Most of the time, prospects are going to hit you with at least one or two objections, although usually it’s more like three or four.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 52 | location 719-721 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 19:07:52

Three Tens even further, and with an ultimate goal of getting the prospect as close as possible to a “10, 10, 10,” both logically and emotionally, which gives the salesperson the best possible chance of closing the deal. The Straight Line technique that we use to accomplish this is called looping.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 52 | location 725-727 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 19:08:52

In other words, each objection creates the opportunity to loop; and each loop results in a further increase to a prospect’s level of certainty; and as each loop is completed, the prospects find themselves that much farther down the line, and that much closer to the close.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 52 | location 731-733 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 19:09:39

In short, the prospect has made it crystal clear to you through their words, their tonality, and, if you’re in person, their body language that they are absolutely certain about all of the Three Tens; yet, for some inexplicable reason, they are still not buying.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 53 | location 737-740 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 19:10:39

When you dig beneath the surface, it turns out that what separates all these potential buyers from one another is the sum of the individual beliefs they have about buying, about making decisions in general, and about trusting other people, especially those who are trying to sell them things.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 53 | location 742-742 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 19:11:03

We call this level of certainty a person’s action threshold, and it comprises the fourth core element of the Straight Line System.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 53 | location 740-741 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 19:11:35

Together, the sum of all these beliefs, and all the experiences that have contributed to the formation of these beliefs, creates a defined “threshold of certainty” that a prospect must cross over before he or she feels comfortable enough to buy.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 53 | location 742-744 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 19:11:44

By way of definition, we refer to people who are very easy to sell to as having a low action threshold; and we refer to people who are very difficult to sell to as having a high action threshold.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 53 | location 742-747 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 19:12:18

By way of definition, we refer to people who are very easy to sell to as having a low action threshold; and we refer to people who are very difficult to sell to as having a high action threshold. Now, that’s all fine and dandy, but what makes this concept so absolutely crucial to a salesperson’s success is a remarkable discovery I made that proved to be the linchpin strategy that allowed people with very little natural sales ability to close at the same level as a natural born salesperson, namely: that a prospect’s action threshold is malleable; it is not set in stone.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 54 | location 750-752 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 19:13:06

I’m talking about prospects who still won’t buy from you, even after you’ve raised their level of certainty as much as humanly possible, and then lowered their action threshold and asked for the order again.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 54 | location 752-753 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 19:13:13

So, for these ultra-tough nuts to crack, we now turn to the fifth core element of the Straight Line System: the pain threshold.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 54 | location 753-756 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 19:13:28

You see, at the end of the day, pain is the most powerful motivator of all—causing human beings to quickly move away from whatever they believe is the source of their pain, and to move towards whatever they believe will resolve their pain. In essence, pain creates urgency, which makes it the perfect vehicle for closing these tougher sales.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 54 | location 756-757 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 19:13:46

To that end it’s absolutely crucial that you take the time to uncover precisely what your prospect’s pain is and where it comes from.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Note on page 54 | location 757 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 19:13:58

VitAL
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 54 | location 753-759 | Added on Tuesday, 26 October 2021 19:15:53

You see, at the end of the day, pain is the most powerful motivator of all—causing human beings to quickly move away from whatever they believe is the source of their pain, and to move towards whatever they believe will resolve their pain. In essence, pain creates urgency, which makes it the perfect vehicle for closing these tougher sales. To that end it’s absolutely crucial that you take the time to uncover precisely what your prospect’s pain is and where it comes from. Once I have that information, I can then position my product as a remedy for their pain, and then verbally paint a picture for them of the future—showing how much better they are going to feel as a result of using my product, which has taken away all their pain and has them feeling pleasure again.
==========

==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 54 | location 760-762 | Added on Sunday, 31 October 2021 23:03:32

and creating just enough pain to push them across their action threshold and get them to buy. So, there you have it:
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 56 | location 776-778 | Added on Sunday, 31 October 2021 23:05:21

The first number is a prospect’s level of certainty about your product; the second number is their level of certainty about you; the third number is their level of certainty about your company; the fourth number addresses their action threshold; and the fifth number addresses their pain threshold.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 56 | location 783-784 | Added on Sunday, 31 October 2021 23:06:13

That said, however, what the Straight Line System can do, once you become reasonably proficient at it, is get you to a point where you can close anyone who’s closable.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 56 | location 786-788 | Added on Sunday, 31 October 2021 23:06:40

However, as powerful as the Straight Line System is, it completely breaks down in the absence of one crucial element, which is: You need to take immediate control of the sale.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 56 | location 790-792 | Added on Sunday, 31 October 2021 23:07:30

Yet, from Tyson’s perspective, because he took immediate control of the encounter, from literally the moment the bell rang, he won the fight by knockout before it had even started—same as he did in the last fight, and the fight before that, and the fight before that.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Bookmark on page 59 | location 799 | Added on Sunday, 31 October 2021 23:08:32


==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 59 | location 811-813 | Added on Tuesday, 2 November 2021 08:04:54

Here’s what happens when scientists flash a test subject a picture of someone: first, the subject’s visual cortex lights up almost instantly, and then, a quarter of a second later, their prefrontal lobe lights up, which is where the judgment center of the brain is located, and a decision gets made. It happens that quickly.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 60 | location 818-820 | Added on Tuesday, 2 November 2021 08:05:45

- Your Highlight on page 61 | location 829-831 | Added on Tuesday, 2 November 2021 08:07:33

- Your Highlight on page 61 | location 837-838 | Added on Tuesday, 2 November 2021 08:08:41

These people were even taught how to dress and how to act and how to talk so people would have confidence in them at a single glance, which is why you started to feel better just by being in their presence. Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 62 | location 850-854 | Added on Tuesday, 2 November 2021 08:10:42

Novices, on the other hand, tend to speak in far less definite terms, and their limited grasp on the deeper nuances of their product and their particular industry becomes more and more apparent as they move a prospect farther down the Straight Line and enter the looping phase, and are forced to “free-form”—meaning, they run out of scripted material and are forced to make things up on the fly in an effort to push their prospect’s level of certainty above their action threshold so they’ll buy.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)

My point here is that how you are perceived will carry through to every part of the sale, but it starts in the first four seconds.

- Your Highlight on page 63 | location 855-856 | Added on Tuesday, 2 November 2021 08:11:06

- Your Highlight on page 63 | location 861-862 | Added on Tuesday, 2 November 2021 08:12:02

Apologies aside, what the study also found was that if you make a negative first impression, it takes eight subsequent positive impressions to erase that one negative first impression.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 63 | location 862-863 | Added on Tuesday, 2 November 2021 08:12:12

Frankly, I don’t know about you, but in all my years in sales, and with all the products I’ve sold, I can’t think of one industry where, if I screwed up the first meeting, I got eight subsequent chances to redeem myself.

- Your Highlight on page 64 | location 871-873 | Added on Tuesday, 2 November 2021 08:13:32

Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 64 | location 874-876 | Added on Tuesday, 2 November 2021 08:13:42

One of things that I had to learn the hard way was that just because you can sell someone something doesn’t necessarily mean that you should.

Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)

but it also causes them to defer to me and basically hand over control of the sale. To demonstrate this authority, I translate features of the service or product into benefits and value for the prospect, while using technical industry lingo that I’ve taken the time to simplify—allowing the prospect to easily grasp what appear to be very complex statements. I’ll also add value by offering a unique perspective during the sales conversation, demonstrating extensive knowledge and understanding of the market, industry, product, prospect, and competitors.

When you immediately establish these three things, they roll up into one simple fact in the prospect’s mind, namely that you’re a person worth listening to.

sharp as you and enthusiastic as

you, and who’s achieved your level of expertise, is going to:

Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 65 | location 898-902 | Added on Tuesday, 2 November 2021 08:18:05

In addition, once the prospect has come to this positive conclusion about you, their brain will instantly extrapolate your value to its logical end, which is: You can help them achieve their goals. You can help get them what they want in life. It could be a core need they’re looking to fulfill; it could be a simple want or desire; it could be to gain control over a certain aspect of their life; or, at the highest level, it could be to alleviate a pain they’re feeling.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 66 | location 902-904 | Added on Tuesday, 2 November 2021 08:18:43

And, again, because the human brain is so naturally adept at this, it takes less than four short seconds for your prospect to rip you apart, analyze each piece of you, and then put you back together based on how you were perceived.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 66 | location 904-905 | Added on Tuesday, 2 November 2021 08:18:55

If you’re perceived the right way—that you’re sharp as a tack, enthusiastic as hell, and an expert in your field—then the prospect will defer to you and let you take control of the sale.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 66 | location 905-907 | Added on Tuesday, 2 November 2021 08:19:04

If you’re perceived the wrong way—that you’re as dull as dishwater, a disinterested bore, and a stone-cold novice—then the opposite happens and the prospect takes control. It’s nothing less than a make-or-break situation.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 66 | location 908-909 | Added on Tuesday, 2 November 2021 08:19:25

the kind who go on and on while their prospect just sits there and listens.

- Your Highlight on page 66 | location 909-910 | Added on Tuesday, 2 November 2021 08:19:29

“take control of the sale,” I assure you that this is not what I’m talking about. I mean,

Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 66 | location 910-911 | Added on Tuesday, 2 November 2021 08:19:35

think about it for a second: don’t you utterly despise being on the receiving end of a salesperson who goes on and on without ever letting you speak?
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 66 | location 912-914 | Added on Tuesday, 2 November 2021 08:19:52

That’s why the Straight Line System is as much about becoming an expert listener as an expert talker. However, to truly become an expert listener, you first need to learn how to take immediate control of the sale. There’s simply no other way. The million-dollar question is how?
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 67 | location 920-922 | Added on Tuesday, 2 November 2021 08:20:37

Since a substantial portion of communication takes place over the phone nowadays, how do you ensure that you’re being perceived the right way when your prospects can’t even see you?
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 67 | location 922-925 | Added on Tuesday, 2 November 2021 08:21:09

Think about that for a moment. What could you say to try to get all that across in those first four seconds? You’d have to be literally yelling at your prospect, “Hey, Bill, listen to me! I’m sharp as a tack! I’m enthusiastic! I’m an expert in my field! I swear, I swear, I swear …” and blah, blah, blah. You’d sound like a freaking idiot! Not to mention that, even if it all were true, no one would believe you anyway.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 68 | location 929-930 | Added on Tuesday, 2 November 2021 08:21:53

where do you turn? The answer is simple: your tone of voice.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 68 | location 930-932 | Added on Tuesday, 2 November 2021 08:21:57

Specifically, how you say what you say has a profound impact on how it’s perceived and, for that matter, how you are perceived; and not just during those all-important first four seconds, but throughout the entire conversation as well.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 68 | location 933-935 | Added on Tuesday, 2 November 2021 08:22:42

For example, when I was a kid and I did something wrong, my mom would say “Jordan!” in a stern, no-nonsense voice, and without her having to say another word, I immediately knew that I was in serious trouble. Conversely, if she said “Jor-dan!” in a singsong tone, then I immediately knew that things were fine.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 68 | location 937-939 | Added on Tuesday, 2 November 2021 08:26:55

Serving as the dual linchpins of an immensely powerful communication strategy known as unconscious communication, tonality and body language play major roles in how we get our point across—both while we’re talking and as we’re listening.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 68 | location 943-946 | Added on Tuesday, 2 November 2021 08:27:45

In terms of percentages, tonality and body language comprise approximately 90 percent of our overall communication, split evenly down the middle, with each modality having approximately a 45 percent impact, depending on which study you buy into (and there are more of them than you can count). The remaining 10 percent of communication is comprised of our words—meaning, the actual words we say as we verbally communicate.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 69 | location 946-946 | Added on Tuesday, 2 November 2021 08:27:58

That’s right: only 10 percent.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 69 | location 949-951 | Added on Tuesday, 2 November 2021 08:28:40

It was as if your logical mind was almost being hypervigilant as it went about deciding what level of logical certainty was most appropriate based on the logical case the salesperson had created with his words.
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 69 | location 957-960 | Added on Tuesday, 2 November 2021 08:29:25

You’ve actually misinterpreted the meaning of my words! You see, despite comprising only 10 percent of our communication, words aren’t just important; they’re actually the single most important element of our communication strategy, but—and this is a very big but—only when we finally open up our mouths to speak. In other words, 90 percent of the time, we’re communicating without actually speaking!
==========
Way of the Wolf: Straight line selling: Master the art of persuasion, influence, and success (Belfort, Jordan)
- Your Highlight on page 70 | location 962-963 | Added on Tuesday, 2 November 2021 08:29:53

==========
A New Earth (Tolle, Eckhart)
- Your Highlight at location 216-219 | Added on Sunday, 7 November 2021 01:24:04

The primary factor in all of this is your state of consciousness in the only time there is: the Now! Make sure the present moment is your friend, not your enemy. Honor it by giving it your fullest attention. Appreciate it by being thankful for it. Become internally aligned with it by allowing it to be as it is. That is the arising of the new earth.

==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 19 | location 561-563 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 11:56:03

The gravity in this room is too high. It’s 15 meters per second per second when it should be 9.8. That’s why things falling “feel” wrong to me. They’re falling too fast. And that’s why I’m so weak despite these muscles. Everything weighs one and a half times as much as it should.
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 22 | location 592-593 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 12:00:56

Thing is, in a centrifuge, the farther you get from the center, the higher the centripetal force will be. So if I were in a centrifuge, the “gravity” down here would be higher than it was upstairs. And it isn’t.
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 22 | location 594-595 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 12:01:09

But what if I’m in a really big centrifuge? One so huge that the force difference between here and the lab is so small it doesn’t change the number of cycles?
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 29 | location 704-704 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 12:10:34

start with what makes me happy.
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 29 | location 704-705 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 12:10:42

got a thrill from all the little experiments I’ve been doing. And I’m in space. So maybe I can think about space and science and see what I get.…
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 30 | location 733-736 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 12:14:46

“Not much. The onboard lab is pretty basic. Just a high-magnification microscope and an x-ray spectrometer. The real mission here is sample return. It’ll be another three months for ArcLight to come home with those samples. The lab is a backup to get at least some data in case there’s a failure during the return phase.”
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 32 | location 753-754 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 12:17:04

Is this actually alien life? Am I really that lucky?! To be alive when humanity first discovers extraterrestrial life?!
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 32 | location 754-755 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 12:17:10

Wow! I mean—the Petrova problem is still terrifying but … wow! Aliens! This could be aliens! I couldn’t wait to talk about this with the kids tomorrow
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 32 | location 763-765 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 12:22:25

That other hatch in the lab—the one that leads farther up—that must be important. This is like being in a video game. Explore the area until you find a locked door, then look for the key. But instead of searching bookshelves and garbage cans, I have to search my mind. Because the “key” is my own name.
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 33 | location 779-781 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 12:24:07

So I’m a single man in my thirties, who lives alone in a small apartment, I don’t have any kids, but I like kids a lot. I don’t like where this is going … A teacher! I’m a schoolteacher! I remember it now! Oh, thank God. I’m a teacher.
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Bookmark on page 34 | location 782 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 12:24:15


==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 37 | location 838-841 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 16:58:50

“You spent years combating the assumption that life requires liquid water. You have an entire section here called ‘The Goldilocks Zone Is for Idiots.’ You call out dozens of eminent scientists by name and berate them for believing a temperature range is a requirement.”
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 38 | location 842-845 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 16:59:20

necessary for life to evolve?” “They’re wrong!” I crossed my arms. “There’s nothing magical about hydrogen and oxygen! They’re required for Earth life, sure. But another planet could have completely different conditions. All life needs is a chemical reaction that results in copies of the original catalyst. And you don’t need water for that!”
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 40 | location 876-877 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 17:01:50

“The ArcLight probe is bringing the samples back to Earth. Some of them might still be alive. I want you to examine them and find out what you can.”
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 40 | location 880-882 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 17:02:16

She was right. Water simply can’t exist at those temperatures. After about 3,000 degrees Celsius, the hydrogen and oxygen atoms can’t stay bound to each other anymore. The surface of the sun was 5,500 degrees Celsius.
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 50 | location 1048-1050 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 17:22:04

“Believe it or not, light has momentum,” I said. “It exerts a force. If you were out in space and you turned on a flashlight, you’d get a teeny, tiny amount of thrust from it.”
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 52 | location 1068-1070 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 17:24:18

“An invasive species. Like cane toads in Australia.” “Good analogy.” I nodded. “And the population is growing. Fast. The more of them there are, the more solar energy gets consumed.”
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 52 | location 1071-1073 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 17:24:31

struggled to remember my Greek and Latin root words. “I think you’d call it ‘Astrophage.’” “Astrophage,” she said. She typed it into her tablet. “Okay. Get back to work. Find out how they breed.”
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 52 | location 1073-1075 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 17:24:39

Astrophage! The word alone makes all my muscles clinch up. A chilling terror that hits like a lead weight. That’s the name. The thing that threatens all life on Earth. Astrophage.
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 52 | location 1076-1078 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 17:25:26

Waaaaait … I don’t think they’re moving at the right speed. I check the stopwatch. I was only daydreaming for ten minutes or so. The sunspots should have moved a fraction of a degree. But they’re halfway off the screen. Way more than they should have moved.
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 53 | location 1084-1085 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 17:26:03

Over ten times faster than the rotation should be. This star I’m looking at … it’s not the sun. I’m in a different solar system.
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Bookmark on page 54 | location 1092 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 17:27:41


==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 55 | location 1102-1104 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 17:29:23

That room is named “Dormitory.” Okay, so this whole diagram lines up with my experiences. And it’s nice to know the official names of things. Underneath the dormitory is a much shorter room, maybe about 1 meter high, named “Storage.”
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 57 | location 1136-1138 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 17:32:52

“I can’t get them hotter or colder.” I pointed to the experiment I’d set up in the fume hood. “I put some Astrophage in ice-cold water for an hour. When I pulled them out, they were 96.415 degrees Celsius. Then I put some in a lab furnace at one thousand degrees. Again, after I pulled them out: 96.415 degrees.”
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 61 | location 1202-1206 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 17:39:54

“Um. There’s carbon and nitrogen … but the vast majority of the sample is hydrogen and oxygen.” I sighed and plopped down in the chair next to the machine. “The ratio of hydrogen to oxygen is two to one.” “What’s wrong?” she asked. “What does that mean?” “It’s water. Astrophage is mostly water.” Her mouth fell open. “How? How can something that exists on the surface of the sun have water?” I shrugged. “Probably because it maintains its internal temperature at 96.415
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Bookmark on page 65 | location 1258 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 17:45:40


==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 76 | location 1435-1436 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 21:30:57

Figure out your velocity? They used Doppler-shift analysis of the light you emit to work it out. And because of that, they also know you’re going both directions: to and from Venus.”
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 78 | location 1453-1456 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 21:33:40

Light. Whatever their navigation system was, it was based on light. I suspected that would be the case. What else could you use in space? There’s no sound. No smell. It would have to be light, gravity, or electromagnetism. And light’s the easiest of those three to detect. At least, as far as evolution is concerned.
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 78 | location 1465-1466 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 22:04:52

Why did they move randomly? My theory: By pure chance, every few seconds or so, an Astrophage thought it had spotted Venus. So it thrusted in that direction. But then the moment passed, so it stopped thrusting.
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 78 | location 1468-1469 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 22:05:08

Everything emits light. The temperature of the object defines the wavelength of light emitted.
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 79 | location 1481-1482 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 22:09:37

When light hits gas molecules, the electrons get all worked up. Then they calm down and re-emit the energy as light.
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 79 | location 1482-1483 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 22:09:45

But the frequency of the photons they emit is very specific to the molecules involved. Astronomers used this for decades to know what gases are out there far, far away. That’s what spectroscopy is all about.
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 79 | location 1484-1487 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 22:10:08

Venus’s atmosphere is ninety times Earth’s pressure and almost entirely carbon dioxide. Its spectroscopy signature of CO2 would be overwhelmingly strong. Mercury had no carbon dioxide at all, so the nearest competitor would be Earth. But we had a minuscule CO2 signature compared to Venus. Maybe Astrophage used emission spectra to find Venus? New plan!
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 80 | location 1489-1490 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 22:10:53

the appropriate filters and built a little box for them. Inside I put a small white lightbulb. Now I had a box that would emit the spectral signature of carbon dioxide.
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 80 | location 1494-1496 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 22:11:32

Good news: Astrophage were attracted to carbon dioxide’s spectral signature! Bad news: My three irreplaceable, 10-micron-wide Astrophage had launched off somewhere—maybe at velocities approaching the speed of light—and I had no idea where they went. “Craaaaaap.”
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 81 | location 1499-1501 | Added on Monday, 22 November 2021 22:13:06

let my eyes adjust to the total darkness. If I saw so much as a single shape that wasn’t my imagination, I sought out the light leak and put tape over it. Finally, I reached a level of darkness so intense I couldn’t see anything. Opening or closing my eyes had no effect at all.
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 82 | location 1521-1522 | Added on Tuesday, 23 November 2021 04:20:34

I’d been staring at these guys for a week. There’s no way I would have missed one. There could only be one explanation: One of the Astrophage divided. I’d accidentally made the Astrophage reproduce.
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 83 | location 1533-1534 | Added on Tuesday, 23 November 2021 04:22:05

Light is a funny thing. Its wavelength defines what it can and can’t interact with. Anything smaller than the wavelength is functionally nonexistent to that photon.
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 84 | location 1547-1548 | Added on Tuesday, 23 November 2021 09:25:17

There’s plenty of hydrogen on the sun. But the other elements just aren’t present. So Astrophage migrates to the nearest supply of carbon dioxide: Venus.
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 84 | location 1551-1552 | Added on Tuesday, 23 November 2021 09:26:27

Ah, and that’s why Astrophage is so inconsistent on reacting to magnetic fields. It only cares about them at the very beginning of its journey and at no other time.
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 84 | location 1552-1553 | Added on Tuesday, 23 November 2021 09:26:34

Then it looks for Venus’s massive carbon dioxide spectral signature. Well, not really “looks for.” It’s probably more a simple stimulus-response thing initiated by the 4.26 and 18.31 micron light bands.
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 84 | location 1555-1556 | Added on Tuesday, 23 November 2021 09:26:51

Our heroic Astrophage reaches the upper atmosphere of Venus, collects the CO2 it needs, and can finally reproduce. After that, both parent and child return to the sun and the cycle begins anew.
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 84 | location 1556-1558 | Added on Tuesday, 23 November 2021 09:26:55

It’s simple, really. Get energy, get resources, and make copies. It’s the same thing all life on Earth does. And that was why two of my little Stooges didn’t walk toward the light.
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 84 | location 1559-1560 | Added on Tuesday, 23 November 2021 09:28:21

separated Moe and Shemp (the sun-seekers) from Larry and Curly (the Venus-seekers).
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 85 | location 1564-1566 | Added on Tuesday, 23 November 2021 09:28:54

I had to sit down and take a breath. I should have taken a nap—I hadn’t slept in thirty-six hours. But this was too exciting. I pulled out my cell phone and dialed Stratt’s number. She answered halfway through the first ring.
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 87 | location 1592-1594 | Added on Tuesday, 23 November 2021 09:31:05

The jet taxied onto some side runway or whatever and a ground crew brought a ladder. I hadn’t gotten halfway down the ladder yet when I heard “Dr. Grace? This way, please!”
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)

“Ladies and gentlemen, this is Dr. Ryland Grace from the United States. He figured out how to breed Astrophage.”
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 90 | location 1638-1639 | Added on Tuesday, 23 November 2021 09:33:59

“I guess I’d make a big elbow-shaped ceramic pipe and fill it with carbon dioxide. Make one end of it as hot as you can get it and have a bright light there.

- Your Highlight on page 244 | location 3934-3936 | Added on Saturday, 4 December 2021 12:17:13

And Eridians, being at the top of the food chain, have a heck of a lot more energy to work with than human bodies do. How much more? Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)

==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 245 | location 3939-3940 | Added on Saturday, 4 December 2021 12:17:49

Eridians take that concept to the ultimate extreme. Rocky’s carapace is made of oxidized minerals. His bones are honeycombed metallic alloys. His blood is mostly liquid mercury. Even his nerves are inorganic silicates transmitting light-based impulses.
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 245 | location 3944-3946 | Added on Saturday, 4 December 2021 12:18:38

Eridian muscles are inorganic. They’re made of porous, sponge-like material sealed in flexible sacs. The majority of the body’s water is tied up in those sacs. And the atmospheric pressure is so high, the 210°C water is still a liquid.
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 245 | location 3946-3949 | Added on Saturday, 4 December 2021 12:19:03

They have two separate circulatory systems: the “ambient” system and the “hot” system. The ambient blood is 210 degrees Celsius. But the hot blood is kept at 305 degrees, which is hot enough to boil water even at Erid’s air pressure. Both circulatory systems have blood vessels that expand or contract around the muscles as needed to set their temperature. Want to expand? Make it hot. Want to contract? Make it cold. In short: Eridians are steam-powered.
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Bookmark on page 245 | location 3941 | Added on Saturday, 4 December 2021 12:19:50


==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 246 | location 3954-3955 | Added on Saturday, 4 December 2021 14:01:54

Oxygen to CO2, CO2 to oxygen, back and forth, always kept in balance. Rocky’s body is a little biosphere. All it needs is energy via food and airflow to dump heat.
==========
Project Hail Mary (Weir, Andy)
- Your Highlight on page 246 | location 3958-3960 | Added on Saturday, 4 December 2021 14:02:58

The other phrase that has hardened into cliché through overuse is “positive thinking.” When it is oversimplified and used as some quick-fix mantra, positive thinking becomes a way of whitewashing or sugarcoating your reality. When you are unable to process real-time information and control your psychological drama, you seize on “positive thinking” as a tranquilizer. Initially, it might seem to imbue your life with new confidence and optimism. But it is essentially limited. In the long term, if you deny or amputate one part of reality, it gives you a lopsided perspective of life.
